QueryDefinition.Query: select e.encid, cast(replace(e.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, cast(replace(e.encid, 'E0000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, e.interaction_type, e.interaction_date, e.interaction_time, ec.provid from {sc}.encounter as e JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND e.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = e.encid LEFT JOIN {sc}.visit v on e.visitid = v.visitid where v.visitid is null order by cast(replace(e.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
